description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Pizza With Berries recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Dessert pizza,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Blueberry,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate
name: Chocolate Pizza With Berries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs mixed dark & white chocolate bits

recipeInstructions.text: Brush base with butter. Bake for 5 minutes or until warmed. Spread base with hazelnut spread and top with berries, chocolate bits and hazelnuts. Bake for a further 5 minutes or until base is crisp and berries are warm. Dust with icing sugar and serve.
